quote: If you focus on success, you’ll have stress. But if you pursue excellence, success will be guaranteed.
author: Deepak Chopra

quote: Success is nothing more than a few simple disciplines, practiced every day.
author: Jim Rohn

quote: Seven Steps to Success 1) Make a commitment to grow daily. 2) Value the process more than events. 3) Don't wait for inspiration. 4) Be willing to sacrifice pleasure for opportunity. 5) Dream big. 6) Plan your priorities. 7) Give up to go up.
author: John C. Maxwell

quote: In order to succeed, your desire for success should be greater than your fear of failure.
author: Bill Cosby

quote: Action is the foundational key to all success.
author: Pablo Picasso

quote: Successful people have libraries. The rest have big screen TVs.
author: Jim Rohn

quote: It is not where you start but how high you aim that matters for success.
author: Nelson Mandela

quote: The way of success is the way of continuous pursuit of knowledge.
author: Napoleon Hill

quote: Success is doing ordinary things extraordinarily well.
author: Jim Rohn

quote: Do not judge me by my successes, judge me by how many times I fell down and got back up again.
author: Nelson Mandela

quote: Successful people don’t have fewer problems. They have determined that nothing will stop them from going forward.
author: Ben Carson

quote: The difference between a successful person and others is not a lack of strength, not a lack of knowledge, but rather a lack in will.
author: Vince Lombardi

quote: If you start today to do the right thing, you are already a success even if it doesn’t show yet.
author: John C. Maxwell

quote: Success usually comes to those who are too busy to be looking for it.
author: Henry David Thoreau

quote: Many of life’s failures are people who did not realize how close they were to success when they gave up.
author: Thomas A. Edison

quote: The successful warrior is the average man, with laser-like focus.
author: Bruce Lee

quote: I don’t know the key to success, but the key to failure is trying to please everyone.
author: Bill Cosby

quote: There are no secrets to success: don’t waste time looking for them. Success is the result of perfection, hard work, learning from failure, loyalty to those for whom you work, and persistence.
author: Colin Powell

quote: Always be yourself, express yourself, have faith in yourself, do not go out and look for a successful personality and duplicate it.
author: Bruce Lee

quote: Whenever you see a successful business, someone once made a courageous decision.
author: Peter F. Drucker

quote: If you have no critics you’ll likely have no success.
author: Malcolm X

quote: Success is knowing your purpose in life, growing to reach your maximum potential, and sowing seeds that benefit others.
author: John C. Maxwell

quote: Success is liking yourself, liking what you do, and liking how you do it.
author: Maya Angelou

quote: Success is not final, failure is not fatal: it is the courage to continue that counts.
author: Winston Churchill

quote: The road to success is dotted with many tempting parking spaces.
author: Will Rogers

quote: The road to success is always under construction.
author: Lily Tomlin

quote: Success is a little like wrestling a gorilla. You don't quit when you're tired. You quit when the gorilla is tired.
author: — Robert Strauss

quote: Try not to become a man of success. Rather become a man of value.
author: Albert Einstein

quote: Success does not consist in never making mistakes but in never making the same one a second time.
author: George Bernard Shaw

quote: You have to remember something: everybody pities the weak; jealousy you have to earn.
author: Arnold Schwarzenegger

quote: The dictionary is the only place that success comes before work.
author: Vince Lombardi

quote: Talent is cheaper than table salt. What separates the talented individual from the successful one is a lot of hard work.
author: Stephen King

quote: Judge your success by what you had to give up in order to get it.
author: Dalai Lama XIV

quote: All successful people, men and women, are big dreamers. They imagine what their future could be, ideal in every respect, and then they work every day toward their distant vision, that goal or purpose.
author: Brian Tracy

quote: The distance between insanity and genius is measured only by success.
author: Bruce Feirstein

quote: The true measure of success is how many times you can bounce back from failure.
author: Stephen Richards

quote: Don't be distracted by criticism. Remember: the only taste of success some people have is when they take a bite out of you.
author: Zig Ziglar

quote: I’m a success today because I had a friend who believed in me and I didn’t have the heart to let him down.
author: Abraham Lincoln

quote: Success will be within your reach only when you start reaching out for it.
author: Stephen Richards

quote: A man is a success if he gets up in the morning and gets to bed at night, and in between he does what he wants to do.
author: Bob Dylan

quote: The ability to discipline yourself to delay gratification in the short term in order to enjoy greater rewards in the long term, is the indispensable prerequisite for success.
author: Brian Tracy

quote: Character cannot be developed in ease and quiet. Only through experience of trial and suffering can the soul be strengthened, vision cleared, ambition inspired, and success achieved.
author: Helen Keller

quote: Success is stumbling from failure to failure with no loss of enthusiasm.
author: Winston Churchill

quote: Sometimes success isn't about making the right decision, it's more about making some decision.
author: Robin S. Sharma

quote: Success is a lousy teacher. It seduces smart people into thinking they can’t lose.
author: Bill Gates

quote: Success is most often achieved by those who don't know that failure is inevitable.
author: Coco Chanel

quote: Eighty percent of success is showing up.
author: Woody Allen

quote: Success is determined not by whether or not you face obstacles, but by your reaction to them. And if you look at these obstacles as a containing fence, they become your excuse for failure. If you look at them as a hurdle, each one strengthens you for the next.
author: Ben Carson

quote: Failure is the condiment that gives success its flavor.
author: Truman Capote

quote: No one lives long enough to learn everything they need to learn starting from scratch. To be successful, we absolutely, positively have to find people who have already paid the price to learn the things that we need to learn to achieve our goals.
author: Brian Tracy

quote: The thing I remember best about successful people I've met all through the years is their obvious delight in what they're doing and it seems to have very little to do with worldly success. They just love what they're doing, and they love it in front of others.
author: — Fred Rogers

quote: I do not think there is any thrill that can go through the human heart like that felt by the inventor as he sees some creation of the brain unfolding to success. Such emotions make a man forget food, sleep, friends, love, everything.
author: — Nikola Tesla

quote: Make the work you are doing today better than the work you did yesterday.
author: Robin S. Sharma

quote: Don’t watch the clock; do what it does. Keep going.
author: — Sam Levenson

quote: You will never change your life until you change something you do daily. The secret of your success is found in your daily routine.
author: John C. Maxwell

quote: Self-trust is the first secret of success.
author: — Ralph Waldo Emerson

quote: Success isn’t overnight. It’s when every day you get a little better than the day before. It all adds up.
author: — Dwayne Johnson

quote: Work like there is someone working twenty-four hours a day to take it all away from you.
author: — Mark Cuban

quote: Do what you have to do until you can do what you want to do.
author: — Oprah Winfrey

quote: All great achievements require time.
author: Maya Angelou

quote: Patience, persistence and perspiration make an unbeatable combination for success.
author: Napoleon Hill

quote: You may be disappointed if you fail, but you are doomed if you don’t try.
author: — Beverly Sills

quote: A man is but the product of his thoughts. What he thinks, he becomes.
author: — Mahatma Gandhi

quote: Do what makes you happy. Keep it simple. Do the research. Work hard. Look ahead.
author: — Gary Vaynerchuk

quote: Success is the sum of small efforts, repeated day in and day out.
author: — Robert Collier

quote: Successful people ask better questions, and as a result, they get better answers.
author: — Tony Robbins

quote: Don’t be afraid to give up the good to go for the great.
author: — John D. Rockefeller

quote: Formal education will make you a living. Self-education will make you a fortune.
author: Jim Rohn

quote: Success is no accident. It is hard work, perseverance, learning, studying, sacrifice and most of all, love of what you are doing or learning to do.
author: — Pelé

quote: Strength and growth come only through continuous effort and struggle.
author: Napoleon Hill

quote: Focus on the possibilities for success, not on the potential for failure.
author: Napoleon Hill

quote: You have within you right now, everything you need to deal with whatever the world can throw at you.
author: Brian Tracy

quote: Victory is sweetest when you’ve known defeat.
author: — Malcolm S. Forbes

quote: A wise man will make more opportunities than he finds.
author: — Francis Bacon

quote: Never give up on a dream just because of the time it will take to accomplish it. The time will pass anyway.
author: — Earl Nightingale

quote: I know the price of success: dedication, hard work, and an unremitting devotion to the things you want to see happen.
author: — Frank Lloyd Wright

quote: Have fun, work hard and money will come. Don’t waste time – grab your chances. Have a positive outlook on life. When it’s not fun, move on.
author: — Richard Branson

quote: I attribute my success to this – I never gave or took any excuse.
author: — Florence Nightingale

quote: The path to success is to take massive, determined action.
author: — Tony Robbins

quote: Expect the best. Prepare for the worst. Capitalize on what comes.
author: Zig Ziglar

quote: Success is neither magical nor mysterious. Success is the natural consequence of consistently applying basic fundamentals.
author: Jim Rohn

quote: Do the best you can until you know better. Then when you know better, do better.
author: Maya Angelou

quote: The more you lose yourself in something bigger than yourself, the more energy you will have.
author: — Norman Vincent Peale

quote: Without hard work, nothing grows but weeds.
author: — Gordon B. Hinckley

quote: Everyone has talent. What is rare is the courage to follow the talent to the dark place where it leads.
author: — Erica Jong

quote: If you really want to do something, you’ll find a way. If you don’t, you’ll find an excuse.
author: Jim Rohn

quote: Don’t let yesterday use up too much of today.
author: Will Rogers

quote: Most great people have attained their greatest success just one step beyond their greatest failure.
author: Napoleon Hill

quote: Motivation is a fire from within. If someone else tries to light that fire under you, chances are it will burn very briefly.
author: — Stephen R. Covey

quote: It’s fine to celebrate success but it is more important to heed the lessons of failure.
author: Bill Gates

quote: I’d rather attempt to do something great and fail than to attempt to do nothing and succeed.
author: — Robert H. Schuller

quote: The only limit to our realization of tomorrow will be our doubts of today. Let us move forward with strong and active faith.
author: — Franklin D. Roosevelt

quote: Success is peace of mind which is a direct result of self-satisfaction in knowing you did your best to become the best you are capable of becoming.
author: — John Wooden

quote: Success is the progressive realization of a worthy goal or ideal.
author: — Earl Nightingale

quote: Hard work spotlights the character of people: some turn up their sleeves, some turn up their noses, and some don’t turn up at all.
author: — Sam Ewing

quote: One secret of success in life is for a man to be ready for his opportunity when it comes.
author: — Benjamin Disraeli

quote: A great leader’s courage to fulfill his vision comes from passion, not position.
author: John C. Maxwell

quote: A mediocre idea that generates enthusiasm will go further than a great idea that inspires no one.
author: — Mary Kay Ash

quote: To know even one life has breathed easier because you have lived. This is to have succeeded.
author: — Ralph Waldo Emerson

quote: You only have to do a very few things right in your life so long as you don’t do too many things wrong.
author: — Warren Buffett

quote: Discipline is the foundation upon which all success is built. Lack of discipline inevitably leads to failure.
author: Jim Rohn

quote: Monday, I grind. Tuesday, I grind. Wednesday, I grind. Thursday, I grind. Friday, I grind. Saturday, I grind. Sunday, I grind. And, that’s why I’m here today.
author: — Eric Thomas

quote: To laugh often and much; to win the respect of intelligent people and the affection of children, to leave the world a better place, to know even one life has breathed easier because you have lived, this is to have succeeded.
author: — Ralph Waldo Emerson

quote: A little more persistence, a little more effort, and what seemed hopeless failure may turn to glorious success.
author: — Elbert Hubbard

quote: When you absolutely believe in yourself and your ability to succeed, nothing will stop you.
author: Brian Tracy

quote: The key of success is for you to set one big, challenging goal and then to pay any price, overcome any obstacle and persist through any difficulty until you finally achieve it.
author: Brian Tracy

quote: The secret of your success is determined by your daily agenda.
author: John C. Maxwell

quote: Success is not a sometimes thing. In other words, you don’t do what is right once in awhile, but all the time. Success is a habit. Winning is a habit.
author: Vince Lombardi

quote: Success leaves clues, Proximity is power. Love your family, CHOOSE your peers.
author: — Tony Robbins

quote: Always wake up with a smile knowing that today you are going to have fun accomplishing what others are too afraid to do.
author: — Mark Cuban

quote: A winner is a dreamer who never gives up.
author: Nelson Mandela

quote: Our greatest weakness lies in giving up. The most certain way to succeed is always to try just one more time.
author: Thomas A. Edison

quote: Do not wait. The time will never be just right. Start where you stand, and work whatever tools you may have at your command and better tools will be found as you go along.
author: Napoleon Hill

quote: FOCUS – Follow One Course Until Successful.
author: — Robert T. Kiyosaki

quote: Losers quit when they fail. Winners fail until they succeed.
author: — Robert T. Kiyosaki

quote: Your life only gets better when you get better.
author: Brian Tracy

quote: Champions keep playing until they get it right.
author: — Billie Jean King

quote: Whatever you think that you will be. If you think yourself weak, weak you will be; if you think yourself strong, you will be.
author: — Swami Vivekananda

quote: Have the courage to follow your heart and intuition. They somehow already know what you truly want to become. Everything else is secondary.
author: — Steve Jobs

quote: An attitude of positive expectation is the mark of the superior personality.
author: Brian Tracy

quote: Life is 10% what happens to me and 90% of how I react to it.
author: John C. Maxwell

quote: Be so good they can’t ignore you.
author: — Steve Martin

quote: I’ve missed more than 9000 shots in my career. I’ve lost almost 300 games. 26 times, I’ve been trusted to take the game winning shot and missed. I’ve failed over and over and over again in my life. And that is why I succeed.
author: — Michael Jordan

quote: Don’t wish it were easier, wish you were better. Don’t wish for fewer problems, wish for more skills. Don’t wish for less challenge, wish for more wisdom.
author: Jim Rohn

quote: He who is not courageous enough to take risks will accomplish nothing in life.
author: — Muhammad Ali

quote: Review your goals twice every day in order to be focused on achieving them.
author: — Les Brown

quote: If you want to increase your success rate, double your failure rate.
author: — Thomas J. Watson

quote: If everyone is moving forward together, then success takes care of itself.
author: — Henry Ford

quote: Sometimes life’s going to hit you in the head with a brick. Don’t lose faith. I’m convinced that the only thing that kept me going was that I loved what I did.
author: — Steve Jobs

quote: While you're out there partying, horsing around, someone out there at the same time is working hard. Someone is getting smarter and someone is winning. Just remember that.
author: Arnold Schwarzenegger

quote: Our greatest glory is not in never falling, but in rising every time we fall.
author: — Confucius

quote: A clear vision, backed by definite plans, gives you a tremendous feeling of confidence and personal power.
author: Brian Tracy

quote: Time is money.
author: — Benjamin Franklin

quote: Everybody has a dream, but not everybody has a grind.
author: — Eric Thomas

quote: Fight for your dreams, and your dreams will fight for you.
author: — Paulo Coelho

quote: Don’t take rest after your first victory because if you fail in second, more lips are waiting to say that your first victory was just luck.
author: — Abdul Kalam

quote: Champions aren’t made in gyms. Champions are made from something they have deep inside them – a desire, a dream, a vision. They have to have the skill, and the will. But the will must be stronger than the skill.
author: — Muhammad Ali

quote: To succeed in your mission, you must have single-minded devotion to your goal.
author: — Abdul Kalam

quote: You are the master of your destiny. You can influence, direct and control your own environment. You can make your life what you want it to be.
author: Napoleon Hill

quote: Life has no limitations, except the ones you make.
author: — Les Brown

quote: I am not a product of my circumstances. I am a product of my decisions.
author: — Stephen R. Covey

quote: Motivation gets you going and habit gets you there.
author: Zig Ziglar

quote: When your desires are strong enough, you will appear to possess superhuman powers to achieve.
author: Napoleon Hill

quote: Until my ONE thing is done, everything else is a distraction.
author: — Gary W. Keller

quote: Dream Big. Start small. Act now.
author: Robin S. Sharma

quote: You can’t hit a target you cannot see, and you cannot see a target you do not have.
author: Zig Ziglar

quote: If you haven't confidence in self, you are twice defeated in the race of life. With confidence, you have won even before you have started.
author: — Marcus Garvey

quote: I’m going to show you how great I am!
author: — Muhammad Ali

quote: What you think about you bring about.
author: — Bob Proctor

quote: Don’t ever let someone tell you that you can’t do something. You got a dream, you gotta protect it. When people can’t do something themselves, they are going to tell you that you can’t do it. You want something, go get it. Period.
author: — Will Smith

quote: If my mind can conceive it, and my heart can believe it, then I can achieve it.
author: — Muhammad Ali

quote: I believe success is achieved by ordinary people with extraordinary determination.
author: Zig Ziglar

quote: The first step to achieving your goal, is to take a moment to respect your goal. Know what it means to you to achieve it.
author: — Dwayne Johnson

quote: The main thing is to keep the main thing the main thing.
author: — Stephen R. Covey

quote: A successful person is one who can lay a firm foundation with the bricks others have thrown at them.
author: — David Brinkley

quote: It doesn't matter where you are coming from. All that matters is where you are going.
author: Brian Tracy

quote: Don't look back – forward, infinite energy, infinite enthusiasm, infinite daring,and infinite patience – then alone can great deeds be accomplished
author: — Swami Vivekananda

quote: You are free to choose, but the choices you make today will determine what you have, be, and do in the tomorrow of your life.
author: Zig Ziglar

quote: When you are not pursuing your goal, you are literally committing spiritual suicide.
author: — Les Brown

quote: Successful people do what unsuccessful people are not willing to do. Don’t wish it were easier; wish you were better.
author: Jim Rohn

quote: We are what we repeatedly do. Excellence, therefore, is not an act, but a habit.
author: — Aristotle

quote: Lack of direction, not lack of time, is the problem. We all have twenty-four hour days.
author: Zig Ziglar

quote: Without your involvement you can’t succeed. With your involvement you can’t fail.
author: — Abdul Kalam

quote: Price is what you pay. Value is what you get.
author: — Warren Buffett

quote: If you want something you have never had, you must be willing to do something you have never done.
author: — Thomas Jefferson

quote: You don’t have to be great to start, but you have to start to be great.
author: Zig Ziglar

quote: Those who keep learning, will keep rising in life.
author: — Charlie Munger

quote: DREAM BIG.
author: QuoteFancy Wallpaper

quote: Nothing in the world is worth having or worth doing unless it means effort, pain, difficulty. I have never in my life envied a human being who led an easy life. I have envied a great many people who led difficult lives and led them well.
author: — Theodore Roosevelt

quote: Make each day count by setting specific goals to succeed, then putting forth every effort to exceed your own expectations.
author: — Les Brown

quote: Your attitude determines your actions, and your actions determine your accomplishment.
author: John C. Maxwell

quote: The greatest pleasure in life is doing what people say you cannot do.
author: — Walter Bagehot

quote: Stay hungry. Stay foolish.
author: — Steve Jobs

quote: The best revenge is massive success.
author: — Frank Sinatra

quote: Success is something you attract by the person you become.
author: Jim Rohn

quote: If you want to change your life you have to raise your standards.
author: — Tony Robbins

quote: Today I will do what others won’t so tomorrow I can do what others can’t.
author: — Jerry Rice

quote: Motivation is what gets you started. Habit is what keeps you going.
author: Jim Rohn

quote: You must either modify your dreams or magnify your skills.
author: Jim Rohn

quote: If people are not laughing at your goals, your goals are too small.
author: — Azim Premji

quote: Most people are too fretful; they worry too much. Success means being very patient, but aggressive when it’s time.
author: — Charlie Munger

quote: The price of success is hard work, dedication to the job at hand, and the determination that whether we win or lose, we have applied the best of ourselves to the task at hand.
author: Vince Lombardi

quote: It never ceases to amaze me to see how much territory can be grasped if one merely masters and consistently uses all the obvious and easily learned principles.
author: — Charlie Munger

quote: Work hard in silence, let your success be your noise.
author: — Anonymous

quote: If you want to walk fast, walk alone. But if you want to walk far, walk together.
author: — Ratan Tata

quote: I hated every minute of training, but I said, “Don’t quit. Suffer now and live the rest of your life as a champion.”
author: — Muhammad Ali

quote: When you want to succeed as bad as you want to breathe, then you’ll be successful.
author: — Eric Thomas

quote: Winning is not a sometime thing; it’s an all time thing. You don’t win once in a while, you don’t do things right once in a while, you do them right all the time. Winning is habit. Unfortunately, so is losing.
author: Vince Lombardi

quote: Success seems to be largely a matter of hanging on after others have let go.
author: — William Feather

quote: Attitude, not aptitude, determines altitude.
author: Zig Ziglar

quote: There is no elevator to success, you have to take the stairs.
author: Zig Ziglar

quote: Opportunities come to pass, not to pause.
author: — James Wallace

quote: Do the one thing you think you cannot do. Fail at it. Try again. Do better the second time. The only people who never tumble are those who never mount the high wire.
author: — Oprah Winfrey

quote: The greatest things in life all require commitment, sacrifice, some struggle and hardship. It’s not easy. But absolutely worth it.
author: Robin S. Sharma

quote: If you see it in your mind, you will hold it in your hand.
author: — Bob Proctor

quote: To be able, at any moment, to sacrifice what you are, for what you will become.
author: — Eric Thomas

quote: If you are not in the process of becoming the person you want to be, you are automatically engaged in becoming the person you don’t want to be.
author: — Dale Carnegie

quote: In a growth mindset, challenges are exciting rather than threatening. So rather than thinking, oh, I’m going to reveal my weaknesses, you say, wow, here’s a chance to grow.
author: — Carol S. Dweck

quote: To be successful, you must be willing to do the things today others won’t do in order to have the things tomorrow others won’t have.
author: — Les Brown

quote: If money is your hope for independence, you will never have it. The only real security that a man can have in this world is a reserve of knowledge, experience and ability.
author: — Henry Ford
